text: The raw materials for photosynthesis are...
Which pigment is essential for photosynthesis?
Write the overall balanced equation for photosynthesis.
Differentiate between Light Reaction and Dark Reaction of photosynthesis.
answer:
Difference between Light and Dark Reactions:
FeatureLight Reaction (Photochemical Phase)Dark Reaction (Biosynthetic Phase)
LocationGrana of the chloroplasts.Stroma of the chloroplasts.
Requirement of LightDirectly dependent on light.Not directly dependent on light, but depends on the products of the light reaction.
Main ProcessPhotolysis of water, formation of ATP and NADPH (assimilatory power).Fixation and reduction of CO2 into glucose using ATP and NADPH.
ProductsATP, NADPH, and Oxygen.Glucose (food), ADP, NADP+.
